dim.name: nDepthTracerIC
dim.description: The number of levels in the vertical direction for tracer initial conditions

dim.name: nDepthEcosysIC
dim.description: The number of levels in the vertical direction for ecosystem tracer initial conditions

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_minimum_depth
nml_option.description: Minimum depth where column contains all water-filled cells. The first layer with refBottomDepth greater than this value is included in whole, i.e. no partial bottom cells are used in this layer.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0, but typically greater than 10 m.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_file
nml_option.description: Path to the depth initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension defining the number of vertical levels in input files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing mid-depth of levels in temperature and salinity initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Conversion factor for depth levels. Should convert units on input depth levels to meters.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_temperature_file
nml_option.description: Path to the temperature initial condition file. Must be interpolated to vertical layers defined in depth file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_salinity_file
nml_option.description: Path to the salinity initial condition file. Must be interpolated to vertical layers defined in depth file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of latitude lines in tracer initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of longitude lines in tracer initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_ndepth_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of vertical levels in tracer initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_depth_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Conversion factor for tracer initial condition depth levels. Should convert units on input depth levels to meters.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in tracer initial condition file. Set to -1 to read from file with config_global_ocean_tracer_ndepth_dimname
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive non-zero integer. A value of -1 causes this to be overwritten with the configurations vertical level definition.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_temperature_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing temperature in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_salinity_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing salinity in salinity initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for tracers should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing latitude coordinates for tracer values in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing longitude coordinates for tracer values in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_depth_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing depth coordinates for tracer values in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate tracer data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_smooth_TS_iterations
nml_option.description: Number of smoothing iterations on temperature and salinity.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater or equal to 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_file
nml_option.description: Name of the file containing shortwaveData (chlA, zenith Angle, clear sky radiation)

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of latitude lines in swData initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of longitude lines in swData initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing latitude coordinates for swData values in swData initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing longitude coordinates for swData values in swData initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for swData should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_swData_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate shortwave data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_chlorophyll_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing chlorophyll in sw Data initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_zenithAngle_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing zenith angle in swData initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_clearSky_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing clear sky radiation in clear sky radiation initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_piston_velocity
nml_option.description: Parameter controlling rate to which SST and SST are restored.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_interior_restore_rate
nml_option.description: Parameter controlling rate to which interior temperature and salinity are restored.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_source
nml_option.description: If 'latlon_file', reads in topography from file specified in config_global_ocean_topography_file. If 'mpas_variable', reads in topography from mpas variable bed_elevation

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_file
nml_option.description: Path to the topography initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the latitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the longitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for topography should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the latitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the longitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the topography in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_has_ocean_frac
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if topograhy file contains a field for the fraction of each cell that contains ocean (vs. land or grounded ice).

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_ocean_frac_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the ocean mask in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate topography data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_fill_bathymetry_holes
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if deep holes in the bathymetry should be filled after interpolation to the MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_smooth_iterations
nml_option.description: How many iterations of topography smoothing by weighted averaging of cellsOnCell to perform.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_smooth_weight
nml_option.description: The weight given to the central cell during smoothing. The n cellsOnCell are given a weight (1-weight)/n.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_deepen_critical_passages
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if critical passages are deepened to a minimum depth.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depress_by_land_ice
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if sea surface pressure and layer thicknesses should be altered by an overlying ice sheet/shelf.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_file
nml_option.description: Path to the land ice topography initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the latitude in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the longitude in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for land ice topography should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the latitude in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the longitude in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_thickness_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the land ice thickness in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_draft_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the land ice draft in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_ice_frac_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the land ice fraction in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_land_ice_topo_grounded_frac_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the grounded land ice fraction in the land ice topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_use_constant_land_ice_cavity_temperature
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if ocean temperature in land-ice cavities is set to a constant temperature.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_constant_land_ice_cavity_temperature
nml_option.description: The constant temperature value to be used under land ice, typically something close to the freezing point.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_cull_inland_seas
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if inland seas should be removed.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_file
nml_option.description: Path to the windstress initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the latitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the longitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for windstress should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the latitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the longitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_zonal_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the zonal component of windstress in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_meridional_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the meridional component of windstress in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate windstress data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Factor to convert input windstress to $N$ $m^{-1}$

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_file
nml_option.description: Name of file containing global values of ecosys variables

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_forcing_file
nml_option.description: Name of file containing global values of ecosys forcing fields

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of latitude lines in ecosys initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of longitude lines in ecosys initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_ndepth_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of vertical levels in ecosys initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_depth_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Conversion factor for ecosys initial condition depth levels. Should convert units on input depth levels to meters.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in ecosys initial condition file. Set to -1 to read from file with config_global_ocean_ecosys_ndepth_dimname
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive non-zero integer. A value of -1 causes this to be overwritten with the configurations vertical level definition.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing latitude coordinates for ecosys values in ecosys initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing longitude coordinates for ecosys values in ecosys initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_depth_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing depth coordinates for ecosys values in ecosys initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for ecosys should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate shortwave data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_ecosys_forcing_time_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines the times in ecosys forcing files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_smooth_ecosys_iterations
nml_option.description: Number of smoothing iterations on ecosystem variables.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater or equal to 0.

var.name: cullStack
var.description: Temporary space to hold a stack for culling inland seas.

var.name: touchedCell
var.description: Temporary space to a hold mask if the cell has been touched or not, when culling inland seas.

var.name: oceanCell
var.description: Temporary space to a hold mask if the cell is an active ocean cell or not.

var.name: cullStackSize
var.description: Integer to hold the size of the cullStack for each block.

var.name: interpActiveTracer
var.description: temporary space for holding one tracer at a time as part of horizontal interpolation

var.name: interpEcosysTracer
var.description: temporary space for holding one tracer at a time as part of horizontal interpolation

var.name: interpActiveTracerSmooth
var.description: temporary space for holding one tracer at a time as part of horizontal interpolation

var.name: interpEcosysTracerSmooth
var.description: temporary space for holding one tracer at a time as part of horizontal interpolation

package.name: landIceInit
package.description: This package includes variables needed for initializing land ice in the init mode

package.name: criticalPassages
package.description: This package includes variables needed for deepening critical passages

var.name: landIceDraftObserved
var.description: z-coordinate of land ice bottom, read in from data file

var.name: landIceThkObserved
var.description: Thickness of land ice, read in from data file

var.name: landIceFracObserved
var.description: Fraction of land ice, read in from data file

var.name: landIceGroundedFracObserved
var.description: Fraction of grounded land ice, read in from data file

var.name: transectCellMasks
var.description: Masks for transects describing critical passages

var.name: criticalPassageLevel
var.description: the vertical level corresponding to the depth of the critical passage
